summary: I have added fixed super enlarged kettles to stash as much of anything you like.
descriptionHtml:
I got sick of debating where I would house my guy up and display all his gear, so I figured, why not allow it all in one spot.


Steed Stone - at the base of it 
Mehrunes Shrine - down the stairs inbetween Lord Stone
Azuras Shrine - connected to the base platform
Mzulft Dwarven Storage - Center of first room
Thousand Steps - Troll passage
Angis Camp - Behind her cabin

I have placed them in reasonable areas for anyone who likes to settle in any specific location. a good convenience for any major unload. Really just a humorous/fun storage spot on the side of having player homes.

Do with it what you please - simply made a static kettle with a cauldron mesh
author: Patrick
